title: Designing Effective Language Instruction Through Analysis of Elementary Students' Attention Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment incorporating observation data collection and analysis activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze elementary students' attention patterns over time and explain at least three key influencing factors
Learners can propose language lesson designs that account for gender-based differences in attention span
Learners can develop 15-minute instructional modules reflecting the impact of class duration and activity types on attention levels
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
